title: My wife just captured a stray ferret running across the road.
body:
She loves animals, and tbh... I do too. SO GD.... now what do I do? Do I raise it as my own? bring it to the 1 ferret shelter that exists in my state? or do I try and locate it's potential owner? I don't know anything other than my wife captured a ferret pokemon style ( minus pokeball ).

edit: I owned 5 ferrets in my life time previously, so I know how to take care of them, but it has been atleast 4 years since I've owned one (life span is 8 years avg, so they die quickly D:)
